Topic.Title: Apparantly Ichan is getting his financing from jeffries

Message.Msg: I can just see it now, a bunch of puppets filling chairs with the real power residing with Mario, Guido and Vinnie. When Carl starts dismantling Dell piece by piece and the money mysteriously vanishes without a trace (probably into some fund run by Michael Milken). You will then realize how badly Carl has screwed you. Then, just as you start to make a case against him he'll send in his mafia thugs to put the squeeze on you. Just like how good ole Carl got started.

Message.Title: Sunday NYT article
Message.Msg: Possibility of an "valuation trial" exists to set a valuation. One estimate was $24.
